title: Hilarious Siege Tower Glitch - Total War Attila
description:
Legend of Total War and I were testing out the new Slavic DLC for Total War attila.  We wanted to demonstrate how OP the poison arrows were....but something much more crazy happen!  Enjoy :D

Legend's Channel: https://www.youtube.com/user/LegendofTotalWar

If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D
